body:

May the lies begin!

replies.body:
1. I'm good for over 100 000 U.S. dollars. (Do I only brag or is this actually true? ;) )

replies.body:
1. I'm a boy
2. I can speak English.
3. I've entered the army at an extremely young age. I fought in many wars. Some personal, mental, or perhaps brutally physical. I spent my ages trying to survive. We had limited food, water as only a bearing from local wells; as local pipelines are contaminated with harmful gases and radiation that can send even the most resilient souls into a coma of despair and fatigue. Our adventures carried insomnia and filth, with not even the slightest bit of bathing to be had. The conditions of the African plains had taken a beating on our men. My friends were killed by Nigerian tribal men, while I was left to suffer a knife wound through my left calf, having to be back on the sweet seas of the Atlantic, heading back to my home where I can gain my fruitful bounty and support as a war veteran to be known as eras continue.
replies.body_tagged:
1. I'm a boy
2. I can speak English.
3. I've entered the army at an extremely young age. I fought in many wars. Some personal, mental, or perhaps brutally physical. I spent my ages trying to survive. We had limited food, water as only a bearing from local wells; as local pipelines are contaminated with harmful gases and radiation that can send even the most resilient souls into a coma of despair and fatigue. Our adventures carried insomnia and filth, with not even the slightest bit of bathing to be had. The conditions of the African plains had taken a beating on our men. My friends were killed by Nigerian tribal men, while I was left to suffer a knife wound through my left calf, having to be back on the sweet seas of the Atlantic, heading back to my home where I can gain my fruitful bounty and support as a war veteran to be known as eras continue.
